atk-s0505a2:2_2: Bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṁ viharante āyasmato ānandassa parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0505a2:2_4: taṁ bhikkhū ca upāsakā ca jānanti.
atk-s0505a2:2_7: So jetavanavihāre āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṁ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavato pabbajjaṁ kittento imaṁ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a2:3_0: Tattha yasmā pabbajjaṁ kittentena yathā pabbaji,
atk-s0505a2:3_3: taṁ kittentena yathā vīmaṁsamāno pabbajjaṁ rocesi,
atk-s0505a2:3_6: Cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā cakkhusampannoti attho.
atk-s0505a2:4_2: Tattha sambādhoti puttadārādisampīḷanena kilesasampīḷanena ca kusalakiriyāya okāsarahito.
atk-s0505a2:4_6: Iti disvāna pabbajīti iti gharāvāsapabbajjāsu byādhijarāmaraṇehi suṭṭhutaraṁ codiyamānahadayo ādīnavamānisaṁsañca vīmaṁsitvā,
atk-s0505a2:4_9: tāvadeva ca dvaṅgulamattasaṇṭhitasamaṇasāruppakesamassu hutvā ghaṭikārena brahmunā upanīte aṭṭha parikkhāre
atk-s0505a2:4_10: gahetvā ‘‘evaṁ nivāsetabbaṁ pārupitabba’’nti kenaci ananusiṭṭho anekajātisahassapavattitena attano pabbajjāciṇṇeneva
atk-s0505a2:4_12: Ekaṁ kāsāvaṁ nivāsetvā ekaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā ekaṁ cīvaraṁ khandhe karitvā mattikāpattaṁ aṁse ālaggetvā pabbajitavesaṁ adhiṭṭhāsīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:5_1: Evaṁ bhagavato pabbajjaṁ kittetvā tato paraṁ pabbajitapaṭipattiṁ anomānadītīraṁ hitvā padhānāya gamanañca
atk-s0505a2:5_3: Tattha kāyena pāpakammaṁ vivajjayīti tividhaṁ kāyaduccaritaṁ vajjesi.
atk-s0505a2:5_5: Ājīvaṁ parisodhayīti micchājīvaṁ hitvā sammājīvameva pavattayi.
atk-s0505a2:6_1: Evaṁ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṁ sodhetvā anomānadītīrato tiṁsayojanappamāṇaṁ sattāhena agamā rājagahaṁ buddho.
atk-s0505a2:6_4: tathāpi buddhassa pubbacariyāti katvā evaṁ vattuṁ labbhati –
atk-s0505a2:6_7: Magadhānanti magadhānaṁ janapadassa nagaranti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:6_9: Tañhi paṇḍavagijjhakūṭavebhāraisigilivepullanāmakānaṁ pañcannaṁ girīnaṁ majjhe vajo viya ṭhitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:6_11: Piṇḍāya abhihāresīti bhikkhatthāya tasmiṁ nagare cari.
atk-s0505a2:6_14: ‘suddhodanassa putto siddhattho nāma kumāro āgato’ti bahumpi me paccayaṁ abhihareyya.
atk-s0505a2:6_15: Na kho pana me taṁ patirūpaṁ pabbajitassa ārocetvā paccayagahaṇaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:6_16: handāhaṁ piṇḍāya carāmī’’ti devadattiyaṁ paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ pārupitvā mattikāpattaṁ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagaraṁ pavisitvā anugharaṁ piṇḍāya acari.
atk-s0505a2:6_19: Ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇoti sarīre ākiritvā viya ṭhapitavaralakkhaṇo vipulavaralakkhaṇo vā.
atk-s0505a2:7_0: 412.Tamaddasāti tato kira purimāni satta divasāni nagare nakkhattaṁ ghositaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0505a2:7_4: Rājāpi ‘‘kammantaṁ saṁvidahissāmī’’ti sīhapañjaraṁ vivaritvā balakāyaṁ passanto taṁ piṇḍāya abhihārentaṁ mahāsattaṁ addasa.
atk-s0505a2:7_8: Imamatthaṁ abhāsathāti imaṁ atthaṁ amaccānaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a2:8_1: Idāni taṁ tesaṁ amaccānaṁ bhāsitamatthaṁ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a2:8_3: Tattha imanti so rājā bodhisattaṁ dasseti,
atk-s0505a2:9_0: 414-5.Nīcakulāmivāti nīcakulā iva pabbajito na hotīti attho.
atk-s0505a2:9_2: Kuhiṁ bhikkhu gamissatīti ayaṁ bhikkhu kuhiṁ gamissati,
atk-s0505a2:9_3: ajja kattha vasissatīti jānituṁ rājadūtā sīghaṁ gacchantu.
atk-s0505a2:9_4: Dassanakāmā hi mayaṁ assāti iminā adhippāyena āha.
atk-s0505a2:10_0: 416.Khippaṁ pattaṁ apūresīti sampajānattā patissatattā ca adhikaṁ agaṇhanto ‘‘alaṁ ettāvatā’’ti ajjhāsayapūraṇena khippaṁ pattaṁ apūresi.
atk-s0505a2:10_1: Munīti monatthāya paṭipannattā appattamunibhāvopi muniicceva vutto,
atk-s0505a2:10_5: So kira manusse pucchi ‘‘imasmiṁ nagare pabbajitā kattha vasantī’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:10_7: Tasmā tameva paṇḍavaṁ abhihāresi ‘‘ettha vāso bhavissatī’’ti evaṁ cintetvā.
atk-s0505a2:11_0: 419-23.Byagghusabhova sīhova girigabbhareti giriguhāyaṁ byaggho viya usabho viya sīho viya ca nisinnoti attho.
atk-s0505a2:11_1: Ete hi tayo seṭṭhā vigatabhayabheravā girigabbhare nisīdanti,
atk-s0505a2:11_4: Sayānabhūmiṁ yāyitvāti yāvatikā bhūmi hatthiassādinā yānena sakkā gantuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:11_14: Daharo cāsīti sati ca daharatte susu bālako viya khāyasīti.
atk-s0505a2:12_1: Dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassūti ettha ‘‘ahaṁ te aṅgamagadhesu yāvicchasi,
atk-s0505a2:12_3: Taṁ tvaṁ sobhayanto anīkaggaṁ nāgasaṅghapurakkhato bhuñjassū’’ti evaṁ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a2:12_5: jātiṁ akkhāhi pucchito’’ti evaṁ kira vutto mahāpuriso cintesi –
atk-s0505a2:12_7: cātumahārājikādayopi maṁ attano attano rajjena nimanteyyuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:12_8: gehe ṭhito eva vā cakkavattirajjaṁ kāreyyaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:12_11: taṁ jānāpemī’’’ti bāhaṁ uccāretvā attano āgatadisābhāgaṁ niddisanto ‘‘ujuṁ janapado rājā’’tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a2:12_13: Himavantañhi nissāya pāsāṇavivarasambhavā mahāsālāpi pañcahi vuddhīhi vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0505a2:12_15: Dhanavīriyena sampannoti bhaṇanto sattahi ratanehi avekallattaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:12_19: Yassa pana ādikālato pabhuti anvayavasena so eva janapado nivāso,
atk-s0505a2:13_1: Ettāvatā attano bhogasampattiṁ dīpetvā ‘‘ādiccā nāma gottena,
atk-s0505a2:13_2: sākiyā nāma jātiyā’’ti iminā jātisampattiñca ācikkhitvā yaṁ vuttaṁ raññā ‘‘dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassū’’ti,
atk-s0505a2:13_7: na īdisaṁ dhanavīriyasampannaṁ dvāsītisahassavīrapurisasamākulaṁ kulaṁ chaḍḍetvā pabbajeyyanti ayaṁ kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a2:14_1: Evaṁ rañño vacanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā tato paraṁ attano pabbajjāhetuṁ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a2:14_6: Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṁ yaṁ na vicāritaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:14_7: taṁ taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthattā eva na vicāritanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:14_8: Evaṁ attano pabbajjāhetuṁ vatvā padhānatthāya gantukāmo rājānaṁ āmantento āha –
atk-s0505a2:14_13: tasmā taṁ paramatthanekkhammaṁ nibbānāmataṁ sabbadhammānaṁ aggaṭṭhena padhānaṁ patthento padhānatthāya gamissāmi,
atk-s0505a2:14_16: Evaṁ vutte kira rājā bodhisattaṁ āha –
atk-s0505a2:14_18: sutaṁ ‘suddhodanarañño kira putto siddhatthakumāro cattāri pubbanimittāni disvā pabbajitvā buddho bhavissatī’ti, sohaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0505a2:14_19: tumhākaṁ adhimuttiṁ disvā evaṁpasanno ‘addhā buddhattaṁ pāpuṇissathā’ti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0505a2:14_20: buddhattaṁ patvā paṭhamaṁ mama vijitaṁ okkameyyāthā’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:18_3: ettha me rañjatī mano’’ti āyasmā ānando pabbajjāsuttaṁ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a2:18_7: Atha gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā buddhāsane nisinno ‘‘taṁ maṁ padhānapahitatta’’nti ārabhitvā imaṁ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a2:19_0: Tattha taṁ manti dvīhipi vacanehi attānameva niddisati.
atk-s0505a2:19_9: Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa adhigamatthaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:20_1: So hi attano visayā nikkhamitukāme devamanusse na muñcati,
atk-s0505a2:20_9: na ca sakkā jīvite sāpekkhena amataṁ adhigantu’’nti .
atk-s0505a2:20_13: na hotīti ajānanto atighoraṁ tapaṁ karoti,
atk-s0505a2:20_14: kadāci mama visayaṁ atikkameyyā’’ti bhīto ‘‘idañcidañca vatvā vāressāmī’’ti āgato.
atk-s0505a2:21_1: Evañca pana vatvā athassa maraṇasantikabhāvaṁ sāvento āha –
atk-s0505a2:21_5: sahassaṁ bhāgānaṁ assāti sahassabhāgo. Ko so ?
atk-s0505a2:21_10: tato pana te eko eva bhāgo jīvitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:21_12: Evaṁ maraṇassa santikabhāvaṁ sāvetvā atha naṁ jīvite samussāhento āha ‘‘jīva bho jīvitaṁ seyyo’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:22_1: Atha attanā sammatāni puññāni dassento āha –
atk-s0505a2:22_3: Tattha brahmacariyanti kālena kālaṁ methunaviratiṁ sandhāyāha,
atk-s0505a2:23_0: 432.Duggo maggoti imaṁ pana aḍḍhagāthaṁ padhānavicchandaṁ janento āha.
atk-s0505a2:23_3: santikamaraṇena tādisenāpi pāpuṇituṁ asakkuṇeyyato durabhisambhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a2:23_4: Ito paraṁ imā gāthā bhaṇaṁ māro,
atk-s0505a2:23_5: aṭṭhā buddhassa santiketi ayamupaḍḍhagāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā.
atk-s0505a2:23_7: Bhagavatā eva pana paraṁ viya attānaṁ niddisantena sabbamettha evaṁjātikaṁ vuttanti ayamamhākaṁ khanti.
atk-s0505a2:24_1: Chaṭṭhagāthāya yenatthenāti ettha paresaṁ antarāyakaraṇena attano atthena tvaṁ, pāpima,
atk-s0505a2:25_1: ‘‘Jīvaṁ puññāni kāhasī’’ti idaṁ pana vacanaṁ paṭikkhipanto ‘‘aṇumattopī’’ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:25_2: Tattha puññenāti vaṭṭagāmiṁ mārena vuttaṁ puññaṁ sandhāya bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a2:26_1: Idāni ‘‘ekaṁso tava jīvita’’nti idaṁ vacanaṁ ārabbha māraṁ santajjento ‘‘atthi saddhā’’ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:26_7: mayhaṁ pana anuttare santivarapade okappanasaddhā atthi,
atk-s0505a2:26_10: so tvaṁ evaṁ maṁ pahitattaṁ uttamajjhāsayaṁ kiṁ jīvamanupucchasi,
atk-s0505a2:26_12: Paññāca mamāti ettha ca saddena sati samādhi ca.
atk-s0505a2:26_13: Evaṁ sante yehi pañcahi indriyehi samannāgatā nibbānaṁ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0505a2:26_14: tesu ekenāpi avirahitaṁ evaṁ maṁ pahitattaṁ kiṁ jīvamanupucchasi? Nanu –
atk-s0505a2:27_1: Evaṁ māraṁ santajjetvā attano dehacittappavattiṁ dassento ‘‘nadīnamapī’’pi gāthāttayamāha.
atk-s0505a2:27_4: yvāyaṁ mama sarīre appāṇakajjhānavīriyavegasamuṭṭhito vāto vattati,
atk-s0505a2:27_5: loke gaṅgāyamunādīnaṁ nadīnampi sotāni ayaṁ visosaye,
atk-s0505a2:27_6: kiñca me evaṁ pahitattassa catunāḷimattaṁ lohitaṁ na upasoseyya.
atk-s0505a2:27_8: apica kho pana tamhi lohite sussamānamhi baddhābaddhabhedaṁ sarīrānugataṁ pittaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:27_12: tassa me evaṁ anupubbena maṁsesu khīyamānesu bhiyyo cittaṁ pasīdati,
atk-s0505a2:27_14: So tvaṁ īdisaṁ cittamajānanto sarīramattameva disvā bhaṇasi ‘‘kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo,
atk-s0505a2:27_17: apica kho pana bhiyyo sati ca paññā ca samādhi mama tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a2:27_18: aṇumattopi pamādo vā sammoho vā cittavikkhepo vā natthi,
atk-s0505a2:27_19: tassa mayhaṁ evaṁ viharato ye keci samaṇabrāhmaṇā atītaṁ vā addhānaṁ anāgataṁ vā etarahi vā opakkamikā vedanā vedayanti,
atk-s0505a2:27_26: evaṁ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ekakāmampi nāpekkhake cittaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:27_27: ‘‘Aho vatāhaṁ subhojanaṁ bhuñjitvā sukhaseyyaṁ sayeyya’’nti īdisenākārena mama cittaṁ na uppannaṁ, passa,
atk-s0505a2:28_1: Evaṁ attano suddhataṁ dassetvā ‘‘nivāressāmi ta’’nti āgatassa mārassa manorathabhañjanatthaṁ mārasenaṁ
atk-s0505a2:28_2: kittetvā tāya aparājitabhāvaṁ dassento ‘‘kāmā te paṭhamā senā’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo āha.
atk-s0505a2:29_0: Tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti,
atk-s0505a2:29_1: te abhibhuyya anagāriyabhāvaṁ upagatānaṁ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu arati uppajjati.
atk-s0505a2:29_7: Tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṁ durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṁ utrāsasaññitā bhīru jāyati,
atk-s0505a2:29_8: tesaṁ ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitānaṁ dīgharattaṁ vivekarasamanassādayamānānaṁ viharataṁ ‘‘na siyā nu kho esa maggo’’ti paṭipattiyaṁ vicikicchā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a2:29_9: taṁ vinodetvā viharataṁ appamattakena visesādhigamena mānamakkhathambhā jāyanti,
atk-s0505a2:29_10: tepi vinodetvā viharataṁ tato adhikataraṁ visesādhigamaṁ nissāya lābhasakkārasilokā uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a2:29_11: lābhādimucchitā dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā micchāyasaṁ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi attānaṁ ukkaṁsenti,
atk-s0505a2:30_1: Evametaṁ dasavidhaṁ senaṁ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa namucino upakārāya saṁvattati,
atk-s0505a2:30_2: tasmā naṁ tava senāti niddisanto āha –
atk-s0505a2:30_8: jetvā ca labhate sukhanti evaṁ tava senaṁ asūro kāye ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti,
atk-s0505a2:30_12: tasmā sukhaṁ patthayamāno ahampi esa muñjaṁ parihareti.
atk-s0505a2:30_13: Saṅgāmāvacarā anivattino purisā attano anivattanakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṁ sīse vā dhaje vā āvudhe vā muñjatiṇaṁ bandhanti,
atk-s0505a2:30_15: Tava senāya parājitassa dhiratthu mama jīvitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:30_20: tasmā jīvitā tayā sammāpaṭipannānaṁ antarāyakarena saddhiṁ saṅgāme mataṁ mama seyyoti attho.
atk-s0505a2:31_3: ettha kāmādikāya attukkaṁsanaparavambhanapariyosānāya tava senāya pagāḷhā nimuggā anupaviṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na dissanti,
atk-s0505a2:31_6: Ete evaṁ pagāḷhā samānā sacepi kadāci ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya ‘‘sāhu saddhā’’tiādinā nayena ummujjanti,
atk-s0505a2:31_7: tathāpi tāya senāya ajjhotthaṭattā tañca maggaṁ na jānanti khemaṁ nibbānagāmīnaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:31_9: Imaṁ pana gāthaṁ sutvā māro puna kiñci avatvā eva pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a2:32_1: Pakkante pana tasmiṁ mahāsatto tāya dukkarakārikāya kiñcipi visesaṁ anadhigacchanto anukkamena ‘‘siyā
atk-s0505a2:32_2: nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’’tiādīni cintetvā oḷārikāhāraṁ āhāretvā,
atk-s0505a2:32_6: tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattento divasaṁ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye mahābodhimaṇḍābhimukho gantvā
atk-s0505a2:32_7: sotthiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo bodhimūle vikiritvā dasasahassalokadhātudevatāhi katasakkārabahumāno –
atk-s0505a2:33_0: ‘‘Kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0505a2:35_0: Caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā ‘‘na dāni buddhattaṁ apāpuṇitvā pallaṅkaṁ bhindissāmī’’ti paṭiññaṁ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0505a2:35_1: Taṁ ñatvā māro pāpimā ‘‘ajja siddhattho paṭiññaṁ katvā nisinno,
atk-s0505a2:35_2: ajjeva dānissa sā paṭiññā paṭibāhitabbā’’ti bodhimaṇḍato yāva cakkavāḷamāyataṁ dvādasayojanavitthāraṁ
atk-s0505a2:35_3: uddhaṁ navayojanamuggataṁ mārasenaṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatappamāṇaṁ girimekhalaṁ hatthirājānaṁ
atk-s0505a2:35_4: āruyha bāhusahassaṁ māpetvā nānāvudhāni gahetvā ‘‘gaṇhatha, hanatha,
atk-s0505a2:35_5: paharathā’’ti bhaṇanto āḷavakasutte vuttappakārā vuṭṭhiyo māpesi,
atk-s0505a2:35_6: tā mahāpurisaṁ patvā tattha vuttappakārā eva sampajjiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:35_7: Tato vajiraṅkusena hatthiṁ kumbhe paharitvā mahāpurisassa samīpaṁ netvā ‘‘uṭṭhehi,
atk-s0505a2:35_10: Mahāpuriso ‘‘na uṭṭhahāmi mārā’’ti vatvā taṁ dhajiniṁ samantā vilokento imā gāthāyo abhāsi ‘‘samantā dhajini’’nti.
atk-s0505a2:36_7: maṁ etasmā ṭhānā aparājitapallaṅkā māro mā cālesīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:37_1: Idāni ‘‘etaṁ te mārasenaṁ bhinditvā tato paraṁ vijitasaṅgāmo sampattadhammarājābhiseko idaṁ karissāmī’’ti dassento āha ‘‘vasīkaritvā’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:37_2: Tattha vasīkaritvā saṅkappanti maggabhāvanāya sabbaṁ micchāsaṅkappaṁ pahāya sammāsaṅkappasseva pavattanena vasīkaritvā saṅkappaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:37_3: Satiñca sūpatiṭṭhitanti kāyādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu attano satiñca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṁ karitvā evaṁ vasīkatasaṅkappo

atk-s0505a2:80_1: Atha brāhmaṇo taṁ bhagavato paramatthayogagambhīraṁ atimadhuragiranibbikārasarasampannaṁ desanaṁ sutvā
atk-s0505a2:80_2: sarīrasampattisūcitañcassa sabbaguṇasampattiṁ sambhāvayamāno pītisomanassajāto ‘‘addhā hi tassā’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:80_7: ayaṁ ajja deyyadhammo ijjhissati samijjhissati mahapphalo bhavissati yaṁ tādisaṁ vedagumaddasāma,
atk-s0505a2:80_9: Tvaññeva hi so vedagū, na añño.
atk-s0505a2:80_10: Ito pubbe pana tumhādisānaṁ vedagūnaṁ antagūnañca adassanena amhādisānaṁ yaññe paṭiyattaṁ añño jano bhuñjati pūraḷāsaṁ carukañca pūvañcāti.
atk-s0505a2:81_1: Tato bhagavā attani pasannaṁ vacanapaṭiggahaṇasajjaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ viditvā yathāssa suṭṭhu pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0505a2:81_2: evaṁ nānappakārehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsetukāmo ‘‘tasmātiha tva’’nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:81_7: Idāni ito pubbaṁ atthenaatthikapadaṁ parapadena sambandhitabbaṁ –
atk-s0505a2:81_8: atthena atthiko tassa atthatthikabhāvassa anurūpaṁ kilesaggivūpasamena santaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:81_11: anekavidhaāsābhāvena nirāsaṁ appevidha ekaṁsena idha ṭhitova idha vā sāsane abhivinde lacchasi adhigacchissasi
atk-s0505a2:81_16: atthena atthiko samāno upasaṅkamma puccha santaṁ vidhūmaṁ anīghaṁ nirāsanti attānaṁ dassento āha.
atk-s0505a2:81_17: Evaṁ pucchanto appevidha abhivinde sumedhaṁ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti evampettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:82_1: Atha brāhmaṇo yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāno bhagavantaṁ āha –
atk-s0505a2:82_4: Tattha yañño yāgo dānanti atthato ekaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:82_9: Anusāsanto ca uttāneneva nayena yattha hutaṁ ijjhate brūhi metanti evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:83_4: Ohitasotassa cassa anusāsanatthaṁ tāva ‘‘mā jātiṁ pucchī’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:83_5: Tattha mā jātiṁ pucchīti yadi hutasamiddhiṁ dānamahapphalataṁ paccāsīsasi,
atk-s0505a2:83_8: Caraṇañca pucchāti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṁ caraṇaṁ puccha.
atk-s0505a2:84_4: na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jāto eva aggikiccaṁ karoti,
atk-s0505a2:84_6: apica kho attano acciādiguṇasampannattā eva karoti.
atk-s0505a2:84_7: Evaṁ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jāto eva dakkhiṇeyyo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:84_9: apica kho nīcākulīnopi uccākulīnopi khīṇāsavamuni dhitimā hirīnisedho ājāniyo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:84_10: imāya dhitihiripamukhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
atk-s0505a2:84_13: Vuttañcetaṁ ‘‘hiriyā hi santo na karonti pāpa’’nti.
atk-s0505a2:89_0: Esa saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana assalāyanasuttānusārena (ma. ni. 2.401 ādayo) veditabbo.
atk-s0505a2:90_1: Evametaṁ bhagavā cātuvaṇṇisuddhiyā anusāsitvā idāni yattha hutaṁ ijjhate,
atk-s0505a2:90_8: Vedantagūti vedehi vā kilesānaṁ antaṁ gato,
atk-s0505a2:90_11: Kālena tamhi habyaṁ paveccheti attano deyyadhammaṭṭhitakālaṁ tassa sammukhībhāvakālañca upalakkhetvā
atk-s0505a2:90_12: tena kālena tādise dakkhiṇeyye deyyadhammaṁ paveccheyya,
atk-s0505a2:91_3: Candova rāhuggahaṇā pamuttāti yathā cando rāhuggahaṇā,
atk-s0505a2:91_4: evaṁ kilesaggahaṇā pamuttā ye atīva bhāsanti ceva tapanti ca.
atk-s0505a2:92_0: 472.Yo kāme hitvāti ito pabhuti attānaṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0505a2:92_4: tañca yo vedi attano paññābalena aññāsi.
atk-s0505a2:92_5: Udakarahado vāti ye ime anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho
atk-s0505a2:92_6: sīhappapātadahoti himavati satta mahārahadā aggisūriyasantāpehi asamphuṭṭhattā niccaṁ sītalā,
atk-s0505a2:93_6: Tathā hi te heṭṭhimaparicchedena catūhi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca pāramiyo pūrenti,
atk-s0505a2:93_30: Assattho vā bodhirukkho hoti nigrodhādīnaṁ vā aññataro.
atk-s0505a2:93_33: Tattha byāmappabhā vā asītippabhā vā sabbesaṁ samānā,
atk-s0505a2:93_41: Imā aṭṭha vemattatā ṭhapetvā avasesesu paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu,
atk-s0505a2:93_42: pahātabbesu vā dosesu natthi nesaṁ viseso,
atk-s0505a2:94_3: Sakalajambudīpaṁ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṁ saṅghaṭṭetvā nisinnā paccekabuddhāpi hi guṇehi ekassa sammāsambuddhassa kalaṁ nāgghanti soḷasiṁ ,
atk-s0505a2:94_8: Lokiyamanussānañhi paññaṁ upanidhāya aṭṭhamakassa paññā adhikā,
atk-s0505a2:94_10: Evaṁ yāva arahato paññaṁ upanidhāya paccekabuddhassa paññā adhikā,
atk-s0505a2:94_11: paccekabuddhassa paññaṁ pana upanidhāya tathāgatassa paññā adhikāti na vattabbā,
atk-s0505a2:94_15: Idha vā huraṁ vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā.
atk-s0505a2:94_17: samo samehi visamehi dūre tathāgato hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a2:94_18: Yasmā anantapañño anupalitto idha vā huraṁ vā,
atk-s0505a2:95_0: 474.Yamhina māyāti ayaṁ pana gāthā aññā ca īdisā māyādidosayuttesu brāhmaṇesu dakkhiṇeyyasaññāpahānatthaṁ vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:96_1: Tena hi mano tīsu bhavesu nivisati,
atk-s0505a2:96_3: Tattheva vā nivisati taṁ hitvā gantuṁ asamatthatāya.
atk-s0505a2:96_8: Anupādiyānoti tesaṁ nivesanapariggahānaṁ abhāvā kañci dhammaṁ anupādiyamāno.
atk-s0505a2:98_6: Ubhayehi pana ubhayaṁ yojetabbaṁ sabbadhīti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu.
atk-s0505a2:99_1: Dukkhaṁ pariññāyāti vaṭṭadukkhaṁ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0505a2:102_4: Anunāsikalopo cettha ‘‘vivekajaṁ pītisukha’’ntiādīsu viya na kato.
atk-s0505a2:102_8: Rāgopi hi duggatīnaṁ pathattā ‘‘rāgapatho’’ti vuccati kammapatho viya.
atk-s0505a2:102_9: Suddho nidoso vimalo akācoti parisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya suddho.
atk-s0505a2:103_0: 482.Attano attānaṁ nānupassatīti ñāṇasampayuttena cittena vipassanto attano khandhesu aññaṁ attānaṁ nāma na passati,
atk-s0505a2:103_2: Yā cāyaṁ ‘‘attanāva attānaṁ sañjānāmī’’ti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati,
atk-s0505a2:103_8: taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya pañcannaṁ cetokhilānañca aṭṭhaṭṭhānāya kaṅkhāya ca abhāvā anejo akhilo akaṅkho.
atk-s0505a2:104_16: ito parañca pahātabbamadhigantabbaṁ vā natthi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a2:105_1: Evaṁ vutte brāhmaṇo bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno pasannākāraṁ karonto āha ‘‘hutañca mayha’’nti.
atk-s0505a2:105_3: yamahaṁ ito pubbe brahmānaṁ ārabbha aggimhi ajuhaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:105_4: taṁ me hutaṁ saccaṁ vā hoti,
atk-s0505a2:105_6: Ajja pana idaṁ hutañca mayhaṁ hutamatthu saccaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:105_9: yasmā idheva ṭhito bhavantarūpaṁ vedaguṁ alatthaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:105_13: paṭiggahetvā ca bhuñjatu me bhagavā pūraḷāsanti taṁ habyasesaṁ upanāmento āha.
atk-s0505a2:106_3: kampi caññaṁ sandhāya ‘kevalinaṁ mahesiṁ khīṇāsavaṁ kukkuccavūpasantaṁ annena pānena upaṭṭhahassū’ti
atk-s0505a2:106_4: bhaṇatī’’ti evaṁ gāthāya atthaṁ asallakkhetvā taṁ ñātukāmo āha ‘‘sādhāhaṁ bhagavā’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:106_9: Yanti yaṁ dakkhiṇeyyaṁ yaññakāle pariyesamāno upaṭṭhaheyyanti pāṭhaseso.
atk-s0505a2:106_13: Sādhāhaṁ bhagavā tava ovādaṁ āgamma tathā vijaññaṁ ārocehi me taṁ kevalinanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a2:107_1: Athassa bhagavā pākaṭena nayena tathārūpaṁ dakkhiṇeyyaṁ dassento ‘‘sārambhā yassā’’ti gāthāttayamāha.
atk-s0505a2:107_2: Tattha sīmantānaṁ vinetāranti sīmāti mariyādā sādhujanavutti,
atk-s0505a2:107_3: tassā antā pariyosānā aparabhāgāti katvā sīmantā vuccanti kilesā,
atk-s0505a2:107_5: Sīmantāti buddhaveneyyā sekkhā ca puthujjanā ca,
atk-s0505a2:107_7: Jātimaraṇakovidanti ‘‘evaṁ jāti evaṁ maraṇa’’nti ettha kusalaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:107_10: Bhakuṭiṁ vinayitvānāti yaṁ ekacce dubbuddhino yācakaṁ disvā bhakuṭiṁ karonti,
atk-s0505a2:108_1: Atha brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ thomayamāno ‘‘buddho bhava’’nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:108_3: tato tato āgamma vā yajitabbametthātipi āyāgo,
atk-s0505a2:108_5: Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṁ na vaṇṇitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:108_6: taṁ sakkā avaṇṇitampi jānitunti uttānatthattāyeva na vaṇṇitaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:112_3: Ayañhi māgho māṇavo dāyako ahosi dānapati.
atk-s0505a2:112_6: udāhu noti samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ etamatthaṁ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0505a2:112_10: Tayidaṁ saṅgītikārānaṁ brāhmaṇassa bhagavatoti tiṇṇampi vacanaṁ samodhānetvā ‘‘māghasutta’’nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a2:113_4: Taṁ panetaṁ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṁ hoti,
atk-s0505a2:113_9: So ca gijjhā tassa kūṭesu vasiṁsu,
atk-s0505a2:114_1: avocāti ettha māghoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:114_5: So hi vīsavassasatikopi pubbāciṇṇavasena ‘‘piṅgiyo māṇavo’’ tveva saṅkhaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a2:115_2: pasavāmīti ettha dāyako dānapatīti dāyako ceva dānapati ca.
atk-s0505a2:115_3: Yo hi aññassa santakaṁ tenāṇatto deti,
atk-s0505a2:115_5: tasmiṁ pana dāne issariyābhāvato na dānapati.
atk-s0505a2:115_6: Ayaṁ pana attano santakaṁyeva deti. Tenāha – ‘‘ahañhi,
atk-s0505a2:115_10: aññatra pana antarantarā maccherena abhibhuyyamāno dāyako anabhibhūto dānapatītiādināpi nayena vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0505a2:115_11: Vadaññūti yācakānaṁ vacanaṁ jānāmi vuttamatteyeva ‘‘ayamidamarahati ayamida’’nti purisavisesāvadhāraṇena bahūpakārabhāvagahaṇena vā.
atk-s0505a2:115_13: Yo hi yācake disvāva bhakuṭiṁ katvā pharusavacanādīni bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a2:115_19: yācamānānañca nesaṁ parehi anuggahakāmehi dinnā bhogā dhammaladdhā nāma dhammādhigatā ca honti,
atk-s0505a2:115_20: so ca tathā pariyesitvā labhi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a2:116_1: Ekaṁseneva hi sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi pasatthaṁ dānaṁ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi dīyamānaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:116_4: Tasmā bhagavāpi ekaṁseneva taṁ pasaṁsanto āha –
atk-s0505a2:116_8: Evaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘bahuṁ so puññaṁ pasavatī’’ti vuttepi dakkhiṇeyyato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṁ sotukāmo brāhmaṇo uttari bhagavantaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0505a2:116_10: ‘‘atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:117_4: yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho puññatthiko hutvā paresaṁ annapānaṁ dadaṁ yajati,
atk-s0505a2:117_7: tassa evarūpassa yajamānassa hutaṁ kathaṁ sujjheyyāti?
atk-s0505a2:118_0: 493.Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tādiso yācayogo dakkhiṇeyyehi ārādhaye sampādaye sodhaye,
atk-s0505a2:118_3: Imināssa ‘‘kathaṁ hutaṁ yajamānassa sujjhe’’ iccetaṁ byākataṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:119_0: 494.Akkhāhi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyyeti ettha yo yācayogo dadaṁ paresaṁ yajati,
atk-s0505a2:119_1: tassa me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye akkhāhīti evaṁ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:120_1: Athassa bhagavā nānappakārehi nayehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsento ‘‘ye ve asattā’’tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a2:121_4: Imissā pana gāthāya dutiyagāthā bhāvanānubhāvappakāsananayena vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:121_7: bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucceyyā’ti (a. ni. 7.71),
atk-s0505a2:121_8: atha khvāssa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccatī’’ti idaṁ cettha suttaṁ sādhakaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:122_8: Idha vā huraṁ vāti idaṁ pana ‘‘kuhiñci loke’’ti imassa vitthāravacanaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:123_4: Idha vippahāyāti idhaloke vattamāne khandhe vihāya,
atk-s0505a2:123_5: tato paraṁ yesaṁ gamanaṁ natthīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:123_6: Ito paraṁ ‘‘ye kāme hitvā agahā caranti,
atk-s0505a2:123_7: susaññatattā tasaraṁva ujju’’nti imampi gāthaṁ keci paṭhanti.
atk-s0505a2:124_3: Attadīpāti attano guṇe eva attano dīpaṁ katvā vicarantā khīṇāsavā vuccanti.
atk-s0505a2:124_6: ye ettha khandhāyatanādisantāne yathā idaṁ khandhāyatanādi tathā jānanti,
atk-s0505a2:124_8: Ayamantimā natthi punabbhavoti ayaṁ no antimā jāti,
atk-s0505a2:124_9: idāni natthi punabbhavoti evañca ye jānantīti.
atk-s0505a2:125_1: Yo vedagūti idāni attānaṁ sandhāya bhagavā imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:125_4: Saraṇaṁ bahūnanti bahūnaṁ devamanussānaṁ bhayavihiṁsanena saraṇabhūto.
atk-s0505a2:126_1: Evaṁ dakkhiṇeyye sutvā attamano brāhmaṇo āha –
atk-s0505a2:126_3: Tattha tvañhettha jānāsi yathā tathā idanti tvañhi ettha loke idaṁ sabbampi ñeyyaṁ yathā tathā jānāsi yāthāvato jānāsi,
atk-s0505a2:126_4: yādisaṁ taṁ tādisameva jānāsīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:126_5: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti tathā hi te esā dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā,
atk-s0505a2:127_1: Evaṁ so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ pasaṁsitvā dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya yaññasampadaṁ ñatvā dāyakasampadāyapi taṁ
atk-s0505a2:127_2: chaḷaṅgaparipūraṁ yaññasampadaṁ sotukāmo ‘‘yo yācayogo’’ti uttaripañhaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0505a2:130_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā’’ti. (a. ni. 6.37; pe. va. 305) –
atk-s0505a2:131_6: Ayañhi ārammaṇaṁ yajamānassa yañño ettha patiṭṭhāya jahāti dosaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:131_7: ayañhi sattesu mettāpubbaṅgamena sammādiṭṭhipadīpavihatamohandhakārena cittena yajamānassa deyyadhammasaṅkhāto yañño ārammaṇaṁ hoti,
atk-s0505a2:131_8: so ettha yaññe ārammaṇavasena pavattiyā patiṭṭhāya deyyadhammapaccayaṁ lobhaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:131_10: tadubhayanidānaṁ mohanti evaṁ tividhampi jahāti dosaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:131_12: sattesu ca pavineyya dosaṁ tappahāneneva pahīnapañcanīvaraṇo anukkamena upacārappanābhedaṁ aparimāṇasattapharaṇena
atk-s0505a2:131_13: ekasatte vā anavasesapharaṇena appamāṇaṁ mettaṁ cittaṁ bhāvento puna bhāvanāvepullatthaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:131_14: rattindivaṁ satataṁ sabbairiyāpathesu appamatto hutvā tameva mettajjhānasaṅkhātaṁ sabbā disā pharate appamaññanti.
atk-s0505a2:132_1: Atha brāhmaṇo taṁ mettaṁ ‘‘brahmalokamaggo aya’’nti ajānanto kevalaṁ attano visayātītaṁ mettābhāvanaṁ
atk-s0505a2:132_2: sutvā suṭṭhutaraṁ sañjātasabbaññusambhāvano bhagavati attanā brahmalokādhimuttattā brahmalokūpapattimeva
atk-s0505a2:132_3: ca suddhiṁ muttiñca maññamāno brahmalokamaggaṁ pucchanto ‘‘ko sujjhatī’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:132_4: Tatra ca brahmalokagāmiṁ puññaṁ karontaṁ sandhāyāha –
atk-s0505a2:132_8: Sakkhi brahmajjadiṭṭhoti brahmā ajja sakkhi diṭṭho.
atk-s0505a2:132_9: Saccanti bhagavato brahmasamattaṁ ārabbha accādarena sapathaṁ karoti.
atk-s0505a2:133_0: Tattha yasmā yo bhikkhu mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṁ uppādetvā tameva pādakaṁ katvā vipassanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a2:133_3: Yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṁ uppādetvā ‘‘santā esā samāpattī’’tiādinā nayena taṁ assādeti,
atk-s0505a2:133_5: Aparihīnajjhāno ca teneva jhānena brahmalokaṁ gacchati,
atk-s0505a2:133_6: tasmā bhagavā yo sujjhati muccati ca,
atk-s0505a2:133_7: tassa brahmalokagamanaṁ ananujānanto anāmasitvāva taṁ puggalaṁ yo bajjhati.
atk-s0505a2:133_8: Tassa tena jhānena brahmalokagamanaṁ dassento brāhmaṇassa sappāyena nayena ‘‘yo yajatī’’ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a2:134_3: Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tañca so tādiso tividhasampattisādhako puggalo tividhaṁ yaññasampadaṁ dakkhiṇeyyehi khīṇāsavehi sādheyya sampādeyya.
atk-s0505a2:134_5: Evaṁ yajitvā sammā yācayogoti evaṁ mettajjhānapadaṭṭhānabhāvena chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṁ yaññaṁ sammā yajitvā
atk-s0505a2:134_6: so yācayogo tena chaḷaṅgayaññūpanissayena mettajjhānena upapajjati brahmalokantibrūmīti brāhmaṇaṁ samussāhento
atk-s0505a2:138_3: Atthavaṇṇanākkamepi cassa pubbasadisaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:138_6: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:138_7: Taṁ kira veḷūhi ca parikkhittaṁ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena,
atk-s0505a2:138_13: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṁ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṁ supi.
atk-s0505a2:138_14: Parijanopissa ‘‘sutto rājā’’ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a2:138_15: Atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0505a2:138_16: Taṁ disvā rukkhadevatā ‘‘rañño jīvitaṁ dassāmī’’ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0505a2:138_19: So taṁ disvā ‘‘imāya mama kāḷakāya jīvitaṁ dinna’’nti kāḷakānaṁ tattha nivāpaṁ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0505a2:138_21: Tasmā taṁ tato pabhuti ‘‘kalandakanivāpo’’ti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ.
atk-s0505a2:139_2: Purāṇasālohitāya devatāyāti na mātā na pitā,
atk-s0505a2:139_3: apica kho panassa mātā viya pitā viya ca hitajjhāsayattā so devaputto ‘‘purāṇasālohitā devatā’’ti vutto.
atk-s0505a2:139_4: Parinibbute kira kassape bhagavati patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye tayo kulaputtā sammukhasāvakānaṁ santike
atk-s0505a2:139_5: pabbajitvā cariyānurūpāni kammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā paccantajanapadaṁ gantvā araññāyatane samaṇadhammaṁ karonti,
atk-s0505a2:139_6: antarantarā ca cetiyavandanatthāya dhammassavanatthāya ca nagaraṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a2:139_7: Aparena ca samayena tāvatakampi araññe vippavāsaṁ arocayamānā tattheva appamattā vihariṁsu,
atk-s0505a2:139_8: evaṁ viharantāpi na ca kiñci visesaṁ adhigamiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:139_11: jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammo adhigantuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:139_13: handa mayaṁ nisseṇiṁ bandhitvā pabbataṁ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṁ karomā’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:140_0: Atha nesaṁ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiññāparivāraṁ arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:140_1: So iddhiyā himavantaṁ gantvā anotatte mukhaṁ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco puna
atk-s0505a2:140_2: aññampi padesaṁ gantvā pattaṁ pūretvā anotattaudakañca nāgalatādantapoṇañca gahetvā tesaṁ santikaṁ āgantvā āha –
atk-s0505a2:140_11: mā dāni tumhe puna amhākaṁ santikaṁ āgamitthā’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:140_12: So kenaci pariyāyena te sampaṭicchāpetuṁ asakkonto pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a2:141_0: Tato tesaṁ eko dvīhatīhaccayena pañcābhiñño anāgāmī ahosi.
atk-s0505a2:141_3: So taṁ paṭikkhipitvā vāyamanto pabbataṁ āruhanadivasato sattame divase kiñci visesaṁ anadhigantvāva kālakato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0505a2:141_6: Devaputto chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu anulomapaṭilomena dibbasampattiṁ anubhavitvā amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0505a2:141_7: devalokā cavitvā aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a2:141_9: taṁ mātāpitaro ‘‘amhākaṁ dhītā samayantaraṁ jānātū’’ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyātesuṁ.
atk-s0505a2:141_10: Tasseko antevāsiko paribbājako tāya saddhiṁ vippaṭipajji.
atk-s0505a2:141_13: Sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṁ vijāyi,
atk-s0505a2:141_15: Sopi sabhiyo vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā vādakkhittatāya
atk-s0505a2:141_16: sakalajambudīpe vicaranto attano sadisaṁ vādiṁ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṁ kārāpetvā khattiyakumārādayo
atk-s0505a2:142_0: Atha bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṁ āgantvā veḷuvane viharati kalandakanivāpe.
atk-s0505a2:142_2: Atha so suddhāvāsabrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ‘‘imāhaṁ visesaṁ kassānubhāvena patto’’ti āvajjento kassapassa
atk-s0505a2:142_3: bhagavato sāsane samaṇadhammakiriyaṁ te ca sahāye anussaritvā ‘‘tesu eko parinibbuto,
atk-s0505a2:142_4: eko idāni katthā’’ti āvajjento ‘‘devalokā cavitvā jambudīpe uppanno buddhuppādampi na jānātī’’ti ñatvā
atk-s0505a2:142_5: ‘‘handa naṁ buddhupasevanāya niyojemī’’ti vīsati pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāge tassa assamamāgamma
atk-s0505a2:142_8: So niddāyamāno tikkhattuṁ taṁ saddaṁ sutvā nikkhamma obhāsaṁ disvā pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a2:142_12: Yo ca te samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime pañhe puṭṭho byākaroti,
atk-s0505a2:142_14: Imaṁ devaputtaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘purāṇasālohitāya devatāya pañhā uddiṭṭhā hontī’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:143_0: Evaṁ vutte ca ne sabhiyo ekavacaneneva padapaṭipāṭiyā uggahesi.
atk-s0505a2:143_1: Atha so brahmā jānantopi tassa buddhuppādaṁ nācikkhi.
atk-s0505a2:143_3: Ito bahiddhā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ tucchabhāva’’nti iminā panādhippāyena evamāha –
atk-s0505a2:143_6: Theragāthāsu pana catukkanipāte sabhiyattherāpadānaṁ vaṇṇentā bhaṇanti ‘‘sā cassa mātā attano vippaṭipattiṁ
atk-s0505a2:143_7: cintetvā taṁ jigucchamānā jhānaṁ uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannā,
atk-s0505a2:144_1: Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti pabbajjūpagamanena lokasammutiyā ca samaṇā ceva brāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0505a2:144_9: Titthakarāti tesaṁ diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjantehi otaritabbānaṁ ogāhitabbānaṁ diṭṭhititthānaṁ kattāro.
atk-s0505a2:144_10: Sādhusammatā bahujanassāti ‘‘sādhavo ete santo sappurisā’’ti evaṁ bahujanassa sammatā.
atk-s0505a2:145_0: Seyyathidanti katame teti ce-iccetasmiṁ atthe nipāto.
atk-s0505a2:145_6: Palāyitvā pana naggesu pabbajitvā ‘‘kassapo aha’’nti gottaṁ uddisi,
atk-s0505a2:145_19: Appicchavasena udake jīvasaññāya ca nhānamukhadhovanādi paṭikkhitto,
atk-s0505a2:146_1: Gahaṭṭhabhāvo hi pabbajjaṁ upanidhāya sīlādiguṇahīnato hīnakāmasukhapaṭisevanato vā ‘‘hīno’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a2:146_5: Iti kirassa sabbaññupaṭiññānampi pabbajitānaṁ tucchakattaṁ disvā ahosi.
atk-s0505a2:146_6: Uppannaparivitakkavaseneva ca āgantvā punappunaṁ vīmaṁsamānassa atha kho sabhiyassa paribbājakassa etadahosi –
atk-s0505a2:146_7: ‘‘ayampi kho samaṇo’’ti ca ‘‘yepi kho te bhonto’’ti ca ‘‘samaṇo kho daharoti na uññātabbo’’ti cāti evamādi.
atk-s0505a2:146_11: ‘‘nibbānaratanaṁ jānāma maya’’nti evaṁ sakāya paṭiññāya lokenāpi sammatā,
atk-s0505a2:146_15: na nīcaṁ katvā jānitabboti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:146_17: ‘‘kimesa ñassatī’’ti evaṁ na gahetabboti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:147_0: 516.Kaṅkhī vecikicchīti sabhiyo bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodamāno evaṁ bhagavato rūpasampattidamūpasamasūcitaṁ
atk-s0505a2:147_3: Tattha ‘‘labheyyaṁ nu kho imesaṁ byākaraṇa’’nti evaṁ pañhānaṁ byākaraṇakaṅkhāya kaṅkhī.
atk-s0505a2:147_4: ‘‘Ko nu kho imassimassa ca pañhassa attho’’ti evaṁ vicikicchāya vecikicchī.
atk-s0505a2:147_5: Dubbalavicikicchāya vā tesaṁ pañhānaṁ atthe kaṅkhanato kaṅkhī,
atk-s0505a2:147_10: Bhavantova evaṁ bhavāhīti dassento āha ‘‘pañhe me puṭṭho…pe…
atk-s0505a2:147_14: Anupubbanti pañhapaṭipāṭiyā anudhammanti atthānurūpaṁ pāḷiṁ āropento.
atk-s0505a2:148_0: 517.Dūratoti so kira ito cito cāhiṇḍanto sattayojanasatamaggato āgato. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a2:148_2: kassapassa bhagavato vā sāsanato āgatattā ‘‘dūrato āgatosī’’ti naṁ āha.
atk-s0505a2:149_0: 518.Puccha manti imāya panassa gāthāya sabbaññupavāraṇaṁ pavāreti.
atk-s0505a2:150_3: Idaṁ pana padaṁ na sabbapāṭhesu atthi.
atk-s0505a2:151_7: Evaṁ sabhiyo ekekāya gāthāya cattāro cattāro katvā pañcahi gāthāhi vīsati pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0505a2:151_8: Bhagavā panassa ekamekaṁ pañhaṁ ekamekāya gāthāya katvā arahattanikūṭeneva vīsatiyā gāthāhi byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:152_3: tasmā assa ‘‘kiṁ pattinamāhu bhikkhuna’’nti imaṁ pañhaṁ byākaronto ‘‘pajjenā’’tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a2:152_5: yo attanā bhāvitena maggena parinibbānagato kilesaparinibbānaṁ patto,
atk-s0505a2:152_6: parinibbānagatattā eva ca vitiṇṇakaṅkho vipattisampattihānibuddhiucchedasassataapuññapuññabhedaṁ vibhavañca bhavañca vippahāya,
atk-s0505a2:152_7: maggavāsaṁ vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavoti ca etesaṁ thutivacanānaṁ araho,
atk-s0505a2:153_1: Yasmā pana vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena nānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca sorato hoti,
atk-s0505a2:153_2: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘sabbattha upekkhako’’tiādinā nayena dutiyapañhabyākaraṇamāha.
atk-s0505a2:153_4: yo sabbattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti,
atk-s0505a2:153_5: na dummano’’ti evaṁ pavattāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako,
atk-s0505a2:153_7: na so hiṁsati neva hiṁsati kañci tasathāvarādibhedaṁ sattaṁ sabbaloke sabbasmimpi loke,
atk-s0505a2:153_11: Yassa cime rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritasaṅkhātā sattussadā keci oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā na santi,
atk-s0505a2:153_12: so imāya upekkhāvihāritāya sativepullatāya ahiṁsakatāya ca vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena iminā oghādinānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca soratoti.
atk-s0505a2:154_1: Yasmā ca bhāvitindriyo nibbhayo nibbikāro danto hoti,
atk-s0505a2:154_2: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘yassindriyānī’’ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:154_4: yassa cakkhādīni chaḷindriyāni gocarabhāvanāya aniccāditilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā vāsanābhāvanāya satisampajaññagandhaṁ gāhāpetvā ca bhāvitāni,
atk-s0505a2:154_5: tāni ca kho yathā ajjhattaṁ gocarabhāvanāya,
atk-s0505a2:154_6: evaṁ pana bahiddhā ca sabbaloketi yattha yattha indriyānaṁ vekallatā vekallatāya vā sambhavo,
atk-s0505a2:154_7: tattha tattha nābhijjhādivasena bhāvitānīti evaṁ nibbijjha ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā imaṁ parañca lokaṁ sakasantatikkhandhalokaṁ
atk-s0505a2:155_0: ‘‘Maraṇe me bhayaṁ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite’’; (Theragā. 20);
atk-s0505a2:158_0: Bhāvito sa dantoti evaṁ bhāvitindriyo so dantoti.
atk-s0505a2:159_1: Yasmā pana buddho nāma buddhisampanno kilesaniddā vibuddho ca,
atk-s0505a2:159_2: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘kappānī’’ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:159_4: Tā hi tathā tathā vikappanato ‘‘kappānī’’ti vuccanti.
atk-s0505a2:162_2: Ettāvatā khandhānaṁ mūlabhūtesu kammakilesesu khandhesu cāti evaṁ tīsupi vaṭṭesu vipassanaṁ āha.
atk-s0505a2:162_3: Dubhayaṁ cutūpapātanti sattānaṁ cutiṁ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṁ viceyya ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0505a2:162_5: Vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṁ visuddhanti rāgādirajānaṁ vigamā aṅgaṇānaṁ abhāvā malānañca vigamā vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṁ visuddhaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:162_7: Tamāhu buddhanti taṁ imāya lokuttaravipassanāya cutūpapātañāṇabhedāya buddhiyā sampannattā imāya ca vigatarajāditāya
atk-s0505a2:162_8: kilesaniddā vibuddhattā tāya paṭipadāya jātikkhayaṁ pattaṁ buddhamāhu.
atk-s0505a2:163_0: Atha vā kappāni viceyya kevalānīti ‘‘anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsi’’ntiādinā (itivu. 99; pārā.
atk-s0505a2:163_3: Saṁsāraṁ dubhayaṁ cutūpapātanti sattānaṁ cutiṁ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṁ saṁsāraṁ ‘‘ime vata bhonto sattā’’tiādinā nayena vicinitvāti attho.
atk-s0505a2:163_6: Āsavakkhayañāṇena hi vigatarajāditā ca nibbānappatti ca hotīti.
atk-s0505a2:163_7: Tamāhu buddhanti evaṁ vijjattayabhedabuddhisampannaṁ taṁ buddhamāhūti.
atk-s0505a2:164_1: Evaṁ paṭhamagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā brahmabhāvaṁ seṭṭhabhāvaṁ
atk-s0505a2:164_3: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘bāhitvā’’ti gāthāya paṭhamaṁ pañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:164_13: Evaṁ thutiraho sa brahmā so brāhmaṇoti.
atk-s0505a2:165_4: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento tato aparāhi tīhi gāthāhi tayo pañhe byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:165_5: Tattha samitāvīti ariyamaggena kilese sametvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a2:165_6: Samaṇo pavuccate tathattāti tathārūpo samaṇo pavuccatīti.
atk-s0505a2:165_8: sesaṁ tasmiṁ samaṇe sabhiyassa bahumānajananatthaṁ thutivacanaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:165_10: so puññapāpānaṁ apaṭisandhikaraṇena pahāya puññapāpaṁ rajānaṁ vigamena virajo,
atk-s0505a2:165_11: aniccādivasena ñatvā imaṁ parañca lokaṁ jātimaraṇaṁ upātivatto tādi ca hoti.
atk-s0505a2:166_1: nhātakoti ettha pana yo ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhāte sabbasmimpi āyatanaloke ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
atk-s0505a2:166_2: uppattirahāni sabbapāpakāni maggañāṇena ninhāya dhovitvā tāya ninhātapāpakatāya taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappiyesu
atk-s0505a2:167_1: Catutthagāthāyapi āguṁ na karoti kiñci loketi yo loke appamattakampi pāpasaṅkhātaṁ āguṁ na karoti,
atk-s0505a2:167_5: Yo hi maggena pahīnaāguttā āguṁ na karoti,
atk-s0505a2:167_6: so kāmayogādike sabbayoge dasasaññojanabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni visajja jahitvā sabbattha khandhādīsu kenaci saṅgena na sajjati,
atk-s0505a2:168_1: Evaṁ dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā ‘‘khettānī’’ti āyatanāni vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a2:168_5: viceyya vā aniccādibhāvena vicinitvā upaparikkhitvā kevalāni anavasesāni,
atk-s0505a2:168_6: visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṁ dibbaṁ mānusakañca brahmakhettaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:168_10: Yato yadetaṁ sabbesaṁ khettānaṁ mūlabandhanaṁ avijjābhavataṇhādi,
atk-s0505a2:168_12: Evametesaṁ khettānaṁ vijitattā vicinitattā vā khettajino nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a2:168_18: Dibbaṁ mānusakañca brahmakhettanti ettha ca devūpagaṁ kammaṁ dibbaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:169_1: Yasmā pana sakaṭṭhena kosasadisattā ‘‘kosānī’’ti kammāni vuccanti,
atk-s0505a2:169_3: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘kosānī’’ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:169_5: lokiyalokuttaravipassanāya visayato kiccato ca aniccādibhāvena kusalākusalakammasaṅkhātāni kosāni viceyya kevalāni,
atk-s0505a2:169_6: visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṁ aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanābhedaṁ dibbaṁ mānusakañca navamahaggatakusalacetanābhedañca brahmakosaṁ viceyya.
atk-s0505a2:169_7: Tato imāya maggabhāvanāya avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā sabbakosānaṁ mūlabandhanā pamutto,
atk-s0505a2:169_10: Atha vā sattānaṁ dhammānañca nivāsaṭṭhena asikosasadisattā ‘‘kosānī’’ti tayo bhavā dvādasāyatanāni ca veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a2:170_1: Yasmā ca na kevalaṁ paṇḍatīti imināva ‘‘paṇḍito’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a2:170_2: apica kho pana paṇḍarāni ito upagato pavicayapaññāya allīnotipi ‘‘paṇḍito’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a2:170_3: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘dubhayānī’’ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṁ byākāsi .
atk-s0505a2:170_5: ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā cāti evaṁ ubhayāni aniccādibhāvena viceyya.
atk-s0505a2:170_7: Tāni hi pakatiparisuddhattā ruḷhiyā ca evaṁ vuccanti,
atk-s0505a2:170_8: tāni viceyya imāya paṭipattiyā niddhantamalattā suddhipañño paṇḍitoti pavuccati tathattā,
atk-s0505a2:170_9: yasmā tāni paṇḍarāni paññāya ito hoti,
atk-s0505a2:170_11: So hi pāpapuññasaṅkhātaṁ kaṇhasukkaṁ upātivatto tādī ca hoti,
atk-s0505a2:171_5: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘asatañcā’’ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:171_8: taṁ ajjhattaṁ bahiddhāti imasmiṁ sabbaloke pavicayañāṇena asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṁ tassa ñātattā
atk-s0505a2:171_9: eva rāgādibhedato sattavidhaṁ saṅgaṁ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato duvidhaṁ jālañca aticca atikkamitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a2:171_10: So tena monasaṅkhātena pavicayañāṇena samannāgatattā muni.
atk-s0505a2:171_12: So hi khīṇāsavamunittā devamanussānaṁ pūjāraho hoti,
atk-s0505a2:172_1: Evaṁ tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā catutthagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yo catūhi maggañāṇavedehi kilesakkhayaṁ karonto gato,
atk-s0505a2:172_5: Tattha chandarāgappahānena tameva sabbaṁ vedamaticca yā vedapaccayā vā aññathā vā uppajjanti vedanā ,
atk-s0505a2:172_7: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘idaṁ pattina’’nti avatvā ‘‘vedānī’’ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:172_8: Yasmā vā yo pavicayapaññāya vedāni viceyya,
atk-s0505a2:172_10: so satthasaññitāni vedāni gato ñāto atikkanto ca hoti.
atk-s0505a2:172_12: sopi vedanāsaññitāni vedāni gato atikkanto ca hoti.
atk-s0505a2:172_14: tasmā tampi atthaṁ dassento ‘‘idaṁ pattina’’nti avatvā imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:173_2: so ca anuvicca papañcanāmarūpaṁ ajjhattaṁ attano santāne taṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedaṁ papañcaṁ tappaccayā nāmarūpañca
atk-s0505a2:173_6: parasantāne ca imassa nāmarūparogassa mūlaṁ avijjābhavataṇhādiṁ,
atk-s0505a2:173_7: tameva vā papañcaṁ anuvicca tāya bhāvanāya sabbesaṁ rogānaṁ mūlabandhanā,
atk-s0505a2:173_10: tasmā eva vā papañcā pamutto hoti,
atk-s0505a2:173_11: tasmā taṁ dassento ‘‘anuviccā’’ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:174_1: ‘‘Kathañca vīriyavā’’ti ettha pana yasmā yo ariyamaggena sabbapāpakehi virato,
atk-s0505a2:174_2: tathā viratattā ca āyatiṁ apaṭisandhitāya nirayadukkhaṁ aticca ṭhito vīriyavāso vīriyaniketo,
atk-s0505a2:174_4: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘virato’’ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:174_5: Padhānavā dhīro tādīti imāni panassa thutivacanāni.
atk-s0505a2:175_1: ‘‘Ājāniyo kinti nāma hotī’’ti ettha pana yasmā pahīnasabbavaṅkadoso kāraṇākāraṇaññū asso vā hatthī vā ‘‘ājāniyo hotī’’ti loke vuccati,
atk-s0505a2:175_2: na ca tassa sabbaso te dosā pahīnā eva,
atk-s0505a2:175_4: tasmā so ‘‘ājāniyo’’ti paramatthato vattabbataṁ arahatīti dassento ‘‘yassā’’ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:175_6: ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā cāti evaṁ ajjhattabahiddhāsaññojanasaṅkhātāni yassa assu lunāni bandhanāni paññāsatthena chinnāni padālitāni.
atk-s0505a2:175_7: Saṅgamūlanti yāni tesu tesu vatthūsu saṅgassa sajjanāya anatikkamanāya mūlaṁ honti,
atk-s0505a2:175_8: atha vā yassa assu lunāni rāgādīni bandhanāni yāni ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca saṅgamūlāni honti,
atk-s0505a2:175_9: so sabbasmā saṅgānaṁ mūlabhūtā sabbasaṅgānaṁ vā mūlabhūtā bandhanā pamutto ‘‘ājāniyo’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a2:176_1: Evaṁ catutthagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā pañcamagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yaṁ chandajjhenamattena akkharacintakā sottiyaṁ vaṇṇayanti,
atk-s0505a2:176_3: Ariyo pana bāhusaccena nissutapāpatāya ca paramatthasottiyo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:176_4: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘idaṁ pattina’’nti avatvā ‘‘sutvā’’ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:176_6: yo imasmiṁ loke sutamayapaññākiccavasena sutvā kātabbakiccavasena vā sutvā vipassanūpagaṁ sabbadhammaṁ
atk-s0505a2:176_8: imāya paṭipadāya kilese kilesaṭṭhāniye ca dhamme abhibhavitvā abhibhūti saṅkhaṁ gato,
atk-s0505a2:176_9: taṁ sutvā sabbadhammaṁ abhiññāya loke sāvajjānavajjaṁ yadatthi kiñci,
atk-s0505a2:176_11: Yasmā ca yo akathaṁkathī kilesabandhanehi vimutto,
atk-s0505a2:176_12: rāgādīhi īghehi anīgho ca hoti sabbadhi sabbesu dhammesu khandhāyatanādīsu,
atk-s0505a2:176_13: tasmā taṁ akathaṁkathiṁ vimuttaṁ anīghaṁ sabbadhi nissutapāpakattāpi ‘‘sottiyo’’ti āhūti.
atk-s0505a2:177_1: Yasmā pana hitakāmena janena araṇīyato ariyo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:177_3: Tasmā yehi guṇehi so araṇīyo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:177_6: cattāri āsavāni dve ca ālayāni paññāsatthena chetvā vidvā viññū vibhāvī catumaggañāṇī so punabbhavavasena na upetigabbhaseyyaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:177_9: Kāmaguṇasaṅkhātañca paṅkaṁ panujja panuditvā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṁ aññatarampi kappaṁ na eti,
atk-s0505a2:177_11: Yasmā vā pāpakehi ārakattā ariyo hoti anaye ca anirīyanā,
atk-s0505a2:177_12: tasmā tampi atthaṁ dassento imāya gāthāya dutiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:177_17: na ca tesu irīyati tasmā ārakāssa honti pāpakā dhammāti imināpatthena.
atk-s0505a2:177_18: Anaye na irīyatīti imināpatthena tamāhu ariyoti ca evampettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:177_19: ‘‘Vidvā so na upeti gabbhaseyya’’nti idaṁ pana imasmiṁ atthavikappe thutivacanameva hoti.
atk-s0505a2:178_1: ‘‘Kathaṁ caraṇavā’’ti ettha pana yasmā caraṇehi pattabbaṁ patto ‘‘caraṇavā’’ti vattabbataṁ arahati,
atk-s0505a2:178_2: tasmā taṁ dassento ‘‘yo idhā’’ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:178_3: Tattha yo idhāti yo imasmiṁ sāsane.
atk-s0505a2:178_8: Yo caraṇanimittaṁ caraṇahetu caraṇapaccayā pattabbaṁ arahattaṁ pattoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:178_9: Caraṇavā soti so imāya caraṇehi pattabbapattiyā caraṇavā hotīti.
atk-s0505a2:178_15: niccaṁ nibbānaninnacittatāya sabbattha ca khandhādīsu na sajjati.
atk-s0505a2:179_1: Yasmā pana kammādīnaṁ paribbājanena paribbājako nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a2:179_2: tasmā tamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘dukkhavepakka’’nti gāthāya catutthapañhaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:179_16: yo tiyaddhapariyāpannampi dukkhajanakaṁ yadatthi kiñci kammaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:179_17: taṁ sabbampi ariyamaggena taṇhāvijjāsinehe sosento apaṭisandhijanakabhāvakaraṇena paribbājayitvā tathā
atk-s0505a2:179_18: paribbājitattā eva ca taṁ kammaṁ pariññāya caraṇato pariññacārī.
atk-s0505a2:179_20: māyaṁ mānamathopi lobhakodhaṁ imepi dhamme pahānapariññāya pariññacārī,
atk-s0505a2:180_1: Evaṁ pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhassa pana sabhiyassa ‘‘yāni ca tīṇī’’tiādīsu abhitthavanagāthāsu osaraṇānīti ogahaṇāni titthāni,
atk-s0505a2:180_3: Tāni yasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā saha brahmajāle vuttadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni gahetvā tesaṭṭhi honti,
atk-s0505a2:180_4: yasmā ca tāni aññatitthiyasamaṇānaṁ pavādabhūtāni satthāni sitāni upadisitabbavasena,
atk-s0505a2:180_6: Uppattivasena pana yadetaṁ ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti saññakkharaṁ vohāranāmaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:180_7: yā cāyaṁ micchāparivitakkānussavādivasena ‘‘evarūpena attanā bhavitabba’’nti bālānaṁ viparītasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a2:180_10: Tāni ca bhagavā vineyya vinayitvā oghatamagā oghatamaṁ oghandhakāraṁ agā atikkanto.
atk-s0505a2:181_1: Tato paraṁ vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṁ pārañca nibbānaṁ tappattiyā dukkhābhāvato tappaṭipakkhato ca taṁ sandhāyāha,
atk-s0505a2:181_3: Atha vā pāragū bhagavā nibbānaṁ gatattā,
atk-s0505a2:181_6: Sammā ca buddho sāmañca buddhoti sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0505a2:182_9: Sabbe devāti ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā ca.
atk-s0505a2:182_10: Nāradapabbatāti tepi kira dve devagaṇā paññavanto,
atk-s0505a2:182_11: tepi anumodantīti sabbaṁ pasādena ca namakkārakaraṇaṁ bhaṇati .
atk-s0505a2:183_1: Anumodanārahaṁ byākaraṇasampadaṁ sutvā ‘‘namo te’’ti añjaliṁ paggahetvā āha.
atk-s0505a2:183_3: Paṭipuggaloti paṭibhāgo puggalo tuvaṁ buddho catusaccapaṭivedhena,
atk-s0505a2:183_9: Puññe cāti lokiye na limpasi tesaṁ akaraṇena,
atk-s0505a2:183_12: Vandati satthunoti evaṁ bhaṇanto gopphakesu pariggahetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitaṁ vandi.
atk-s0505a2:184_3: Apica mettha puggalavemattatā viditāti apica mayā ettha aññatitthiyānaṁ parivāse puggalanānattaṁ viditaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:184_9: Avijahitvā āgatopi ca yo maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno hoti,
atk-s0505a2:184_13: atthatthiko tvaṁ ‘maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno’ti viditametaṁ mayā’’ti tassa pabbajjaṁ anujānanto āha –
atk-s0505a2:184_15: Sabhiyo pana attano ādaraṁ dassento āha ‘‘sace bhante’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:184_16: Taṁ sabbaṁ aññañca tathārūpaṁ uttānatthattā pubbe vuttanayattā ca idha na vaṇṇitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:188_3: Atthavaṇṇanākkamepi cassa pubbasadisaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:189_0: Tatrāyaṁ tassā nadiyā āvibhāvatthaṁ ādito pabhuti vaṇṇanā –
atk-s0505a2:189_2: Tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo ‘‘samuddo’’ti saṅkhaṁ gato.
atk-s0505a2:189_4: Tisahassayojanapamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītisahassakūṭehi paṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto.
atk-s0505a2:189_5: Yattha āyāmavitthārena gambhīratāya ca paññāsapaññāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā pūraḷāsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ
atk-s0505a2:190_5: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṁ suvaṇṇamayaṁ dviyojanasatubbedhaṁ antovaṅkaṁ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṁ tameva saraṁ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:190_8: gandhamādanakūṭaṁ sānumayaṁ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṁ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṁ kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṁ jalantaṁ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a2:190_10: Sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṁ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0505a2:190_14: Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena taṁ obhāsenti,
atk-s0505a2:191_0: Tattha manoharasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmalūdakāni nahānatitthāni suppaṭiyattāni honti,
atk-s0505a2:192_7: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṁ tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
atk-s0505a2:192_9: Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0505a2:192_11: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṁ tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṁ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0505a2:192_12: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṁ paharitvā vuṭṭhāya pariṇāhena tigāvutapamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena
atk-s0505a2:192_13: saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
atk-s0505a2:192_15: Tatra paññāsayojanapamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā.
atk-s0505a2:192_16: Pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṁ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṁ pavisiya saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā.
atk-s0505a2:192_17: Tato ghanapathaviṁ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā viñjhaṁ nāma tiracchānapabbataṁ paharitvā
atk-s0505a2:192_19: Sā tikkhattuṁ anotattaṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā gataṭṭhāne ‘‘āvaṭṭagaṅgā’’ti vuccati .
atk-s0505a2:192_20: Ujukaṁ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ‘‘kaṇhagaṅgā’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a2:192_23: Kūlaṁ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṁ pavisiya saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ‘‘bahalagaṅgā’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a2:192_24: Pathaviṁ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ‘‘umaṅgagaṅgā’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a2:192_25: Viñjhaṁ nāma tiracchānapabbataṁ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne ‘‘gaṅgā, yamunā,
atk-s0505a2:192_29: Tāsu yā ayaṁ pañcamī mahī nāma,
atk-s0505a2:193_3: Tattha dūrepi bhabbapuggale disvā sahasā gamanaṁ turitacārikā.
atk-s0505a2:193_5: Taṁ paccuggacchanto hi bhagavā muhutteneva tigāvutaṁ agamāsi,
atk-s0505a2:193_12: Gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā pana piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṁ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṁ aturitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0505a2:193_18: dvādasahi satehi paññāsāya ca bhikkhūhi saddhinti vuttaṁ hoti. Yena…pe…
atk-s0505a2:193_19: tadavasarīti āpaṇabahulatāya so nigamo ‘‘āpaṇo’’ tveva nāmaṁ labhi.
atk-s0505a2:193_21: Yena disābhāgena maggena vā so aṅguttarāpānaṁ raṭṭhassa nigamo osaritabbo,
atk-s0505a2:194_3: dhanarakkhaṇatthāya pana tāpasapabbajjaṁ samādāya rañño paṇṇākāraṁ datvā bhūmibhāgaṁ gahetvā tattha assamaṁ
atk-s0505a2:194_5: Assamepi cassa eko tālarukkho divase divase ekaṁ suvaṇṇaphalaṁ muñcatīti vadanti.
atk-s0505a2:194_6: So divā kāsāyāni dhāreti jaṭā ca bandhati,
atk-s0505a2:194_7: rattiṁ yathāsukhaṁ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
atk-s0505a2:194_10: kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṁyeva taṁ kulaṁ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:194_12: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-s0505a2:195_0: Itipi so bhagavāti ādimhi pana ayaṁ tāva yojanā –
atk-s0505a2:195_4: iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:195_7: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a2:195_8: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi maggena savāsanānaṁ kilesānaṁ viddhaṁsitattāti ārakattā arahaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:195_9: Te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṁ hatattāpi arahaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:195_12: āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṁ anādikālapavattaṁ saṁsāracakkaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:195_13: Tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṁ
atk-s0505a2:195_14: gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṁ hatattātipi arahaṁ .
atk-s0505a2:195_15: Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye sakkāragarukārādīni ca arahatīti paccayādīnaṁ arahattāpi arahaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:195_16: Yathā ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṁ karonti,
atk-s0505a2:195_17: evaṁ nāyaṁ kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:198_0: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṁ tena pavuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:199_1: Atisayavisuddhāhi vijjāhi abbhuttamena caraṇena ca samannāgatattā vijjācaraṇasampanno.
atk-s0505a2:199_2: Sobhanagamanattā sundaraṁ ṭhānaṁ gatattā suṭṭhu gatattā sammā gadattā ca sugato.
atk-s0505a2:199_4: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā khandhāyatanādibhedaṁ saṅkhāralokaṁ avedi,
atk-s0505a2:199_22: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe satte jānātīti sabbathā sattalokaṁ avedi.
atk-s0505a2:199_23: Tathā ekaṁ cakkavāḷaṁ āyāmato vitthārato ca yojanānaṁ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni aḍḍhapañcamāni ca satāni,
atk-s0505a2:199_24: parikkhepato chattiṁsa satasahassāni dasa sahassāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni ca satāni.
atk-s0505a2:206_0: Saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti’’.
atk-s0505a2:226_8: Taṁ sabbampi ekaṁ cakkavāḷaṁ ekā lokadhātu.
atk-s0505a2:226_11: anantena buddhañāṇena aññāsīti sabbathā okāsalokaṁ avedi.

atk-s0505a2:404_9: katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0505a2:404_10: So tato pabhuti rājakule bhattakiccaṁ katvā himavantacātumahārājikabhavanādīnaṁ aññataraṁ gantvā divāvihāraṁ karoti.
atk-s0505a2:404_11: Athekadivasaṁ tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ gantvā ratanavimānaṁ pavisitvā dibbaratanapallaṅke nisinno samādhisukhaṁ
atk-s0505a2:404_12: anubhavitvā sāyanhasamayaṁ vuṭṭhāya vimānadvāre ṭhatvā ito cito ca vilokento saṭṭhiyojanāya mahāvīthiyā
atk-s0505a2:404_13: celukkhepaṁ katvā bodhisattaguṇapasaṁsitāni thutivacanāni vatvā kīḷante sakkappamukhe deve addasa.
atk-s0505a2:406_2: Padattho pana paṭhamagāthāya tāva saṅgamoti saṅgāmo.
atk-s0505a2:407_1: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmavāsī tettiṁsamanussaseṭṭho magho nāma māṇavo hutvā satta vattapadāni
atk-s0505a2:407_4: sakkāraṁ nesaṁ karissāmā’’ti vatvā dibbapadumāni upanāmesuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:407_6: Sakko upaḍḍharajjena asantuṭṭho sakaparisaṁ saññāpetvā ekadivasaṁ surāmadamatte te pāde gahetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipi.
atk-s0505a2:407_7: Tesaṁ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasasahassayojanaṁ asurabhavanaṁ nibbatti pāricchattakapaṭicchannabhūtāya citrapāṭaliyā upasobhitaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:407_8: Tato te satiṁ paṭilabhitvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ apassantā ‘‘aho re naṭṭhā mayaṁ pānamadadosena,
atk-s0505a2:407_13: Tato pabhuti ‘‘asurā’’icceva uppannasamaññā hutvā ‘‘handa dāni devehi saddhiṁ saṅgāmemā’’ti sineruṁ parito ārohiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:407_14: Tato sakko asure yuddhena abbhuggantvā punapi samudde pakkhipitvā catūsu dvāresu attanā sadisaṁ indapaṭimaṁ māpetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0505a2:407_15: Tato asurā ‘‘appamatto vatāyaṁ sakko niccaṁ rakkhanto tiṭṭhatī’’ti cintetvā punadeva nagaraṁ agamiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:407_16: Tato devā attano jayaṁ ghosentā mahāvīthiyaṁ celukkhepaṁ karontā nakkhattaṁ kīḷiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:407_17: Atha asito atītānāgate cattālīsakappe anussarituṁ samatthatāya ‘‘kiṁ nu kho imehi pubbepi evaṁ kīḷitapubba’’nti
atk-s0505a2:407_18: āvajjento taṁ devāsurasaṅgāme devavijayaṁ disvā āha –
atk-s0505a2:411_0: Tasmimpi kāle etādiso lomahaṁsano pamodo na āsi.
atk-s0505a2:411_1: Kimabbhutaṁ daṭṭhu marū pamoditāti ajja pana kiṁ abbhutaṁ disvā evaṁ devā pamuditāti.
atk-s0505a2:412_5: Pucchāmi vohanti attanā āvajjetvā ñātuṁ samatthopi tesaṁ vacanaṁ sotukāmatāya pucchati.
atk-s0505a2:413_1: Athassa tamatthaṁ ārocentehi devehi vuttāya tatiyagāthāya bodhisattoti bujjhanakasatto,
atk-s0505a2:413_2: sammāsambodhiṁ gantuṁ araho satto ratanavaroti vararatanabhūto.
atk-s0505a2:413_3: Tenamha tuṭṭhāti tena kāraṇena mayaṁ tuṭṭhā.
atk-s0505a2:413_4: So hi buddhattaṁ patvā tathā dhammaṁ desessati,
atk-s0505a2:413_5: yathā mayañca aññe ca devagaṇā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiṁ pāpuṇissāma.
atk-s0505a2:413_6: Manussāpissa dhammaṁ sutvā ye na sakkhissanti parinibbātuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:413_7: te dānādīni katvā devaloke paripūressantīti ayaṁ kira nesaṁ adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a2:413_8: Tattha ‘‘tuṭṭhā kalyarūpā’’ti kiñcāpi idaṁ padadvayaṁ atthato abhinnaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:413_10: kiṁ devasaṅgho atiriva kalyarūpo’’ti imassa pañhadvayassa vissajjanatthaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:414_1: Idāni yena adhippāyena bodhisatte jāte tuṭṭhā ahesuṁ,
atk-s0505a2:414_2: taṁ āvikarontehi vuttāya catutthagāthāya sattaggahaṇena devamanussaggahaṇaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:414_4: Evaṁ dvīhi padehi pañcasupi gatīsu seṭṭhabhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0505a2:414_8: Devamanussesu pana ye attahitāya paṭipannādayo cattāro puggalā,
atk-s0505a2:415_1: Pañcamagāthāya taṁ saddanti taṁ devehi vuttavacanasaddaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:416_7: Asitavhayassāti asitanāmassa dutiyena nāmena kaṇhadevilassa isino.
atk-s0505a2:417_6: Alattha pītinti disvā punapi pītiṁ labhi.
atk-s0505a2:418_1: Tato paraṁ bodhisattassa devehi sadā payujjamānasakkāradīpanatthaṁ vuttaaṭṭhamagāthāya anekasākhanti anekasalākaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:419_2: Kaṇhasirivhayoti kaṇhasaddena ca sirisaddena ca avhayamāno.
atk-s0505a2:419_11: Purimaṁ vā dassanapītilābhāpekkhaṁ gāthāvasāne ‘‘vipulamalattha pīti’’nti vacanato,
atk-s0505a2:419_15: Disvāti satasahassagghanake gandhārarattakambale suvaṇṇanikkhaṁ viya kumāraṁ ‘‘chattaṁ marū’’ti ettha
atk-s0505a2:419_17: Keci pana ‘‘idaṁ mānusakaṁ chattaṁ sandhāya vutta’’nti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0505a2:419_20: Evaṁ santepi na tassa vacanena kocipi atisayo atthi,
atk-s0505a2:419_24: Athassa pādā parivattitvā isissa matthake patiṭṭhahiṁsu.
atk-s0505a2:419_25: So tampi acchariyaṁ disvā udaggacitto sumano paṭiggahesi.
atk-s0505a2:420_5: So kira attano abhimukhāgatesu mahāsattassa pādatalesu cakkāni disvā tadanusārena sesalakkhaṇāni jigīsanto
atk-s0505a2:420_6: sabbaṁ lakkhaṇasampattiṁ disvā ‘‘addhāyaṁ buddho bhavissatī’’ti ñatvā evamāha.
atk-s0505a2:421_2: Akalyarūpo gaḷayati assukānīti taṁ attano arūpūpapattiṁ anussaritvā ‘‘na dānāhaṁ assa dhammadesanaṁ sotuṁ
atk-s0505a2:421_3: lacchāmī’’ti atuṭṭharūpo balavasokābhibhavena domanassajāto hutvā assūni pāteti gaḷayati.
atk-s0505a2:421_10: Evaṁ santepi domanassuppattiyevassa ayuttā samāpattilābhena vikkhambhitattāti ce? Na,
atk-s0505a2:421_12: Maggabhāvanāya samucchinnā hi kilesā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a2:421_14: Uppanne kilese parihīnajjhānattā kutassa arūpagamananti ce?
atk-s0505a2:421_16: Samāpattilābhino hi uppanne kilese balavavītikkamaṁ anāpajjantā vūpasantamatteyeva kilesavege puna taṁ visesaṁ appakasirenevādhigacchanti,
atk-s0505a2:421_19: No ce kumāre bhavissati antarāyoti na bhavissati nu kho imasmiṁ kumāre antarāyo.
atk-s0505a2:422_1: Dvādasāyaṁ na orakāyanti ayaṁ orako paritto na hoti.
atk-s0505a2:425_4: Evaṁ niggato ca so bhāgineyyaṁ sayanti sakaṁ bhāgineyyaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:425_6: Samādapesīti attano appāyukabhāvaṁ ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhaginiyā ca puttassa nālakassa māṇavakassa upacitapuññataṁ
atk-s0505a2:425_7: attano balena ñatvā ‘‘vuḍḍhippatto pamādampi āpajjeyyā’’ti naṁ anukampamāno bhaginiyā gharaṁ gantvā ‘‘kahaṁ
atk-s0505a2:425_10: ‘‘Ānetha na’’nti āṇāpetvā taṅkhaṇaṁyeva tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbājetvā samādapesi ovadi anusāsi. Kathaṁ?
atk-s0505a2:426_3: dhammaṁ vā aggaṁ saha paṭipadāya nibbānaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:427_2: tasmiṁ samaye kilesavikkhambhane samādhilābhe ca sati vikkhambhitakilesena samāhitacittena cāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a2:427_3: Anāgate paramavisuddhadassināti ‘‘ayaṁ nālako anāgate kāle bhagavato santike paramavisuddhaṁ nibbānaṁ
atk-s0505a2:427_4: passissatī’’ti evaṁ diṭṭhattā so isi iminā pariyāyena ‘‘anāgate paramavisuddhadassī’’ti vutto.
atk-s0505a2:427_10: So kira tato pabhuti udake na nimujji ‘‘udakaṁ pavisitvā sotindriyaṁ vināseyya,
atk-s0505a2:428_1: Aṭṭhārasāyaṁ sutvāna ghosanti so nālako evaṁ parivasanto anupubbena bhagavatā sambodhiṁ patvā bārāṇasiyaṁ
atk-s0505a2:428_3: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā uppanno’’tiādinā nayena jinavaracakkavattane pavattaghosaṁ attano atthakāmāhi devatāhi āgantvā ārocitaṁ sutvā.
atk-s0505a2:428_4: Gantvāna disvā isinisabhanti sattāhaṁ devatāhi moneyyakolāhale kayiramāne sattame divase isipatanaṁ gantvā ‘‘nālako āgamissati,
atk-s0505a2:428_5: tassa dhammaṁ desessāmī’’ti iminā ca abhisandhinā varabuddhāsane nisinnaṁ disvā nisabhasadisaṁ isinisabhaṁ bhagavantaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:428_9: Samāgate asitāvhayassa sāsaneti asitassa isino ovādakāle anuppatte. Tena hi –
atk-s0505a2:428_11: tadā gantvā samayaṁ paripucchamāno carassu tasmiṁ bhagavati brahmacariya’’nti anusiṭṭho,
atk-s0505a2:430_4: Yaṁ asito ‘‘sambodhiyaggaṁ phusissatāyaṁ kumāro’’ti ñatvā ‘‘buddhoti ghosaṁ yada parato suṇosi,
atk-s0505a2:430_6: tadetaṁ mayā asitassa vacanaṁ ajja bhagavantaṁ sakkhiṁ disvā ‘‘yathātathamevā’’ti aññātanti.
atk-s0505a2:430_8: Sabbadhammāna pāragunti hemavatasutte vuttanayena chahi ākārehi.
atk-s0505a2:431_2: Bhikkhācariyaṁ jigīsatoti ariyehi āciṇṇaṁ anupakkiliṭṭhaṁ bhikkhācariyaṁ pariyesamānassa.
atk-s0505a2:432_1: Athassa evaṁ puṭṭho bhagavā ‘‘moneyyaṁ te upaññissa’’ntiādinā nayena moneyyapaṭipadaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a2:432_4: Dukkaraṁ durabhisambhavanti kātuñca dukkhaṁ kayiramānañca sambhavituṁ sahituṁ dukkhanti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:432_7: yadi naṁ kātuṁ vā abhisambhotuṁ vā sukhaṁ bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a2:432_8: evaṁ pana dukkaraṁ durabhisambhavaṁ puthujjanakālato pabhuti kiliṭṭhacittaṁ anuppādetvā paṭipajjitabbato.
atk-s0505a2:432_9: Tathā hi naṁ ekassa buddhassa ekova sāvako karoti ca sambhoti cāti.
atk-s0505a2:433_0: Evaṁ bhagavā moneyyassa dukkarabhāvaṁ durabhisambhavatañca dassento nālakassa ussāhaṁ janetvā tamassa vattukāmo āha ‘‘handa te naṁ pavakkhāmi,
atk-s0505a2:433_3: Te naṁ pavakkhāmīti tuyhaṁ taṁ moneyyaṁ pavakkhāmi.
atk-s0505a2:433_5: Daḷho bhavāti durabhisambhavasahanasamatthāya asithilaparakkamatāya thiro hoti.
atk-s0505a2:433_8: tasmāhaṁ ekantabyavasitova hutvā evaṁ dukkaraṁ durabhisambhavampi samānaṁ tuyhaṁ taṁ moneyyaṁ pavakkhāmi,
atk-s0505a2:434_1: Evaṁ paramasallekhaṁ moneyyavattaṁ vattukāmo nālakaṁ santhambhane daḷhībhāve ca niyojetvā paṭhamaṁ tāva
atk-s0505a2:435_5: raññāpi vandito samāno ‘‘maṁ vandatī’’ti uddhaccaṁ nāpajjeyya.
atk-s0505a2:436_3: araññasaññite dāyepi iṭṭhāniṭṭhavasena uccāvacā nānappakārā ārammaṇā niccharanti,
atk-s0505a2:436_6: Yathā vā ḍayhamāne vane aggisikhā nānappakāratāya uccāvacā niccharanti,
atk-s0505a2:436_11: evaṁ sīhabyagghamanussāmanussavividhavihaṅgavirutapupphaphalapallavādibhedavasena nānappakāratāya dāye uccāvacā ārammaṇā niccharanti bhiṁsanakāpi,
atk-s0505a2:436_17: Evaṁ niccharantesu ca uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu yā kāci uyyānavanacārikaṁ gatā samānā pakatiyā vā vanacāriniyo
atk-s0505a2:436_18: kaṭṭhahārikādayo rahogataṁ disvā hasitalapitaruditadunnivatthādīhi nāriyo muniṁ palobhenti,
atk-s0505a2:437_1: Evamassa bhagavā gāme ca araññe ca paṭipattividhiṁ dassetvā idāni sīlasaṁvaraṁ dassento ‘‘virato methunā dhammā’’ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a2:437_2: Tattha hitvā kāme paropareti methunadhammato avasesepi sundare ca asundare ca pañca kāmaguṇe hitvā.
atk-s0505a2:437_3: Tappahānena hi methunavirati susampannā hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a2:437_7: na ghātaye’’ti ettha vuttāya pāṇātipātāveramaṇiyā sampattidassanatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-s0505a2:437_11: sabbepi sataṇhanittaṇhatāya tasathāvare pāṇe jīvitukāmatāya amaritukāmatāya sukhakāmatāya dukkhapaṭikūlatāya
atk-s0505a2:437_12: ca ‘‘yathā ahaṁ tathā ete’’ti attasamānatāya tesu virodhaṁ vinento teneva pakārena ‘‘yathā ete tathā
atk-s0505a2:437_13: aha’’nti paresaṁ samānatāya ca attani anurodhaṁ vinento evaṁ ubhayathāpi anurodhavirodhavippahīno hutvā
atk-s0505a2:437_14: maraṇapaṭikūlatāya attānaṁ upamaṁ katvā pāṇesu ye keci tase vā thāvare vā pāṇe na haneyya sāhatthikādīhi payogehi,
atk-s0505a2:438_1: Evamassa methunaviratipāṇātipātaviratimukhena saṅkhepato pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlaṁ vatvā ‘‘hitvā kāme’’tiādīhi
atk-s0505a2:438_2: indriyasaṁvarañca dassetvā idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṁ dassento ‘‘hitvā icchañcā’’tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a2:438_4: yāyaṁ taṇhā ekaṁ laddhā dutiyaṁ icchati,
atk-s0505a2:438_6: satasahassaṁ laddhā taduttarimpi icchatīti evaṁ appaṭiladdhavisayaṁ icchanato ‘‘icchā’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a2:438_8: Taṁ hitvā icchañca lobhañca yattha satto puthujjano,
atk-s0505a2:438_9: yasmiṁ cīvarādipaccaye tehi icchālobhehi puthujjano satto laggo paṭibaddho tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a2:438_10: tattha taṁ ubhayampi hitvā paccayatthaṁ ājīvapārisuddhiṁ avirodhento ñāṇacakkhunā cakkhumā hutvā imaṁ moneyyapaṭipadaṁ paṭipajjeyya.
atk-s0505a2:438_12: duppūraṇaṭṭhena narakasaññitaṁ micchājīvahetubhūtaṁ imaṁ paccayataṇhaṁ tareyya,
atk-s0505a2:438_13: imāya vā paṭipadāya tareyyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a2:439_1: Evaṁ paccayataṇhāpahānamukhena ājīvapārisuddhiṁ dassetvā idāni bhojane mattaññutāmukhena paccayaparibhogasīlaṁ tadanusārena ca yāva arahattappatti,
atk-s0505a2:439_4: dhammena samena laddhesu itarītaracīvarādīsu paccayesu āhāraṁ tāva āhārento –
atk-s0505a2:442_3: Ūnūdaro hontopi ca mitāhāro assa bhojane mattaññū,
atk-s0505a2:442_4: ‘‘neva davāyā’’tiādinā paccavekkhaṇena guṇato dosato ca paricchinnāhāro.
atk-s0505a2:442_5: Evaṁ mitāhāro samānopi paccayadhutaṅgapariyattiadhigamavasena catubbidhāya appicchatāya appiccho assa.
atk-s0505a2:442_6: Ekaṁsena hi moneyyapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannena bhikkhunā evaṁ appicchena bhavitabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:442_7: Tattha ekekasmiṁ paccaye tīhi santosehi santussanā paccayappicchatā.
atk-s0505a2:442_8: Dhutaṅgadharasseva sato ‘‘dhutavāti maṁ pare jānantū’’ti anicchanatā dhutaṅgappicchatā.
atk-s0505a2:442_9: Bahussutasseva sato ‘‘bahussutoti maṁ pare jānantū’’ti anicchanatā pariyattiappicchatā majjhantikattherassa viya.
atk-s0505a2:442_10: Adhigamasampannasseva sato ‘‘adhigato ayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammanti maṁ pare jānantū’’ti anicchanatā adhigamappicchatā.
atk-s0505a2:442_13: Evaṁ appicchopi ca arahattamaggena taṇhāloluppaṁ hitvā alolupo assa.
atk-s0505a2:442_14: Evaṁ alolupo hi sadā icchāya nicchāto aniccho hoti nibbuto,
atk-s0505a2:442_15: yāya icchāya chātā honti sattā khuppipāsāturā viya atittā,
atk-s0505a2:442_16: tāya icchāya aniccho hoti anicchattā ca nicchāto hoti anāturo paramatittippatto.
atk-s0505a2:442_17: Evaṁ nicchātattā nibbuto hoti vūpasantasabbakilesapariḷāhoti evamettha uppaṭipāṭiyā yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a2:443_2: tāvapaṭipadaṁ kathetvā idāni taṁ paṭipadaṁ paṭipannassa bhikkhuno arahattappattiniṭṭhaṁ dhutaṅgasamādānaṁ
atk-s0505a2:443_4: Tattha sa piṇḍacāraṁ caritvāti so bhikkhu bhikkhaṁ caritvā bhattakiccaṁ vā katvā.
atk-s0505a2:443_5: Vanantamabhihārayeti apapañcito gihipapañcena vanaṁ eva gaccheyya.
atk-s0505a2:443_6: Upaṭṭhito rukkhamūlasminti rukkhamūle ṭhito vā hutvā.
atk-s0505a2:443_10: Ettha ca ‘‘piṇḍacāraṁ caritvā’’ti iminā piṇḍapātikaṅgaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:443_11: Yasmā pana ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko sapadānacārī ekāsaniko pattapiṇḍiko khalupacchābhattiko ca hotiyeva,
atk-s0505a2:443_17: Yathākkamaṁ pana etesaṁ anulomattā abbhokāsikayathāsanthatikasosānikaṅgāni vuttāniyeva hontīti evametāya
atk-s0505a2:444_0: 715.Sa jhānapasuto dhīroti so anuppannassa jhānassa uppādanena uppannassa āvajjanasamāpajjanādhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇehi
atk-s0505a2:444_3: Vanante ramito siyāti vane abhirato siyā,
atk-s0505a2:444_7: apica kho tasmiṁyeva rukkhamūle sotāpattimaggādisampayuttena lokuttarajjhānenāpi attānaṁ atīva tosento jhāyetha.
atk-s0505a2:444_8: Paramassāsappattiyā hi lokuttarajjhāneneva cittaṁ atīva tussati,
atk-s0505a2:444_11: Evamimāya gāthāya jhānapasutatāya vanantasenāsanābhiratiṁ arahattañca kathesi.
atk-s0505a2:445_1: Idāni yasmā imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā nālakatthero vanantamabhihāretvā nirāhāropi paṭipadāpūraṇe atīva ussukko ahosi,
atk-s0505a2:445_2: nirāhārena ca samaṇadhammaṁ kātuṁ na sakkā.
atk-s0505a2:445_6: Tasmā tassa bhagavā aparāparesupi divasesu piṇḍāya caritabbaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:445_7: kilesā pana na uppādetabbāti dassanatthaṁ arahattappattiniṭṭhaṁyeva bhikkhācāravattaṁ kathento ‘‘tato ratyā vivasāne’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo abhāsi.

atk-s0505a2:495_4: Tato tanti tato maññitākārā taṁ nāmarūpaṁ hoti aññathā.
atk-s0505a2:496_1: Tañhi lokena salabhamacchamakkaṭādīhi padīpabaḷisalepādayo viya ‘‘idaṁ sukha’’nti upanijjhāyitaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:496_2: Tadamariyānaṁ etaṁ dukkhanti taṁ idaṁ ariyānaṁ ‘‘kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā,
atk-s0505a2:496_4: khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 136) nayena ‘‘etaṁ dukkha’’nti yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:496_7: Tadamariyānanti taṁ idaṁ ariyānaṁ paramatthasukhato ‘‘etaṁ sukha’’nti yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:497_4: Yāvatatthīti vuccatīti yāvatā ete cha ārammaṇā atthīti vuccanti.
atk-s0505a2:498_6: Yaṁ pareti ettha yanti vatthukāme sandhāyāha.
atk-s0505a2:499_6: bālānaṁ avijjāya nivutānaṁ otthaṭānaṁ andhabhāvakaraṇo tamo hoti,
atk-s0505a2:499_9: āloko passatāmivāti satañca sappurisānaṁ paññādassanena passataṁ ālokova vivaṭaṁ hoti nibbānaṁ.
atk-s0505a2:499_11: magā dhammassakovidāti yaṁ attano sarīre tacapañcakamattaṁ paricchinditvā anantarameva adhigantabbato,
atk-s0505a2:499_12: attano khandhānaṁ vā nirodhamattato santike nibbānaṁ,
atk-s0505a2:499_13: taṁ evaṁ santike santampi na vijānanti magabhūtā janā maggāmaggadhammassa saccadhammassa vā akovidā,
atk-s0505a2:500_1: Pacchimagāthāya sambandho ‘‘evaṁ asusambudhaṁ ko nu aññatra mariyehī’’ti.
atk-s0505a2:500_3: ṭhapetvā ariye ko nu añño nibbānapadaṁ jānituṁ arahati,
atk-s0505a2:500_4: yaṁ padaṁ catutthena ariyamaggena sammadaññāya anantarameva anāsavā hutvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbanti,
atk-s0505a2:500_5: sammadaññāya vā anāsavā hutvā ante anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṁ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a2:501_2: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasminti imasmiṁ soḷasame veyyākaraṇe.
atk-s0505a2:502_0: Evaṁ sabbesupi soḷasasu veyyākaraṇesu saṭṭhimatte saṭṭhimatte katvā saṭṭhiadhikānaṁ navannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu,
atk-s0505a2:502_1: soḷasakkhattuṁ cattāri cattāri katvā catusaṭṭhi saccānettha veneyyavasena nānappakārato desitānīti.
